description: Demolition of two storey commercial building and scrap metal yard bounded by Herald Street, Witan Street and Glass Street and erection of new residential building ranging between 6 and 9 storeys (including the creation of a basement), to accommodate 553 sqm of commercial space (Class D1) at ground floor and 62 residential units (21 x 1 bed, 33 x 2 bed, 8 x 3 bed) at the upper floors, together with associated works.
